subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Ronnie Peoples said under oath that he had arranged a seven-figure loan for Vince Young during the 2011 lockout because the player wanted to throw himself a $300,000 birthday party.
snippet: Ronnie Peoples said under oath that he had arranged a seven-figure loan for Vince Young during the 2011 lockout because the player wanted to throw himself a $300,000 birthday party.
